document_data.name: Kulnajriem
document_data.mainbody: '''Kulnajriem''' was a [[stone giant]] artist and noted recluse from the [[Heartcoil Deeps]] who was active in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He carried with him large, intricately carved stones that he hurled at enemies in battle.
